name: danielcsgomes/mailchimpapi
description: Abstract Mailchimp API connector for PHP 5.3+

suggest.kriswallsmith/buzz: Enabling Buzz allows you to use the BuzzHttpAdapter.
suggest.ext-curl: Enabling the curl extension allows you to use CurlHttpAdapter.
suggest.guzzle/guzzle: Enabling Guzzle allows you to use the GuzzleHttpAdapter.
suggest.zendframework/zend-http: Enabling Zend_Http allows you to use the ZendHttpAdapter.
